song_lyrics: Sant maḷyā chhe sohāgī Mahantrūpe, Sant maḷyā chhe sohāgī,
Haribhajan anurāgī Mahantrūpe, Sant maḷyā chhe sohāgī.
Ango ange rahyā Shrījīne dhārī, darshane jīv jāya jāgī,
Vaḍavānaḷ sam patit uddhārak, Harimā draḍh raṭ lāgī... Mahantrūpe 1
Vhālo ichchhe chhe jenī padraj chaḍhāvā, jagnā ādhār vitarāgī,
Mokṣha dvār evā Sant te batāvyā, mukti āpe chhe vaṇmāgī... Mahantrūpe 2
Kol dīdhā chhe rahevā akhanḍ Santmā, bhavnī bhramaṇāyu bhāgī,
Prabhu pragaṭ āj Mahantjī maḷatā, bhakto thayā baḍbhāgī... Mahantrūpe 3
title: Sant maḷyā chhe sohāgī Mahantrūpe

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1186: Prabhubhai Patel

Category: Mahant Swami Maharajna Pad
